overview: Kos (13) is going through the most bizarre period in his life. His mother died a few years ago and his dad is having a heart attack. While Kosâ€™ father is in the hospital, it looks like the hotel he is running will be a big mess. But Kos and his three sisters do not intend to let that happen. After the siblings find out that father is deep in financial problems, the hotel is threatened with closure. The children however come up with a solution: someone has to win the local beauty pageant, with a hefty cash prize attached.
title: The Fantastic Family Hotel
